item.title: Rain Light Fade
item.description:
Rain Light Fade

Rain Light Fade is a rock band and artistic collaboration, hailing from Seattle, WA. They draw their influence from bands such as Depeche Mode, Alice and Chains, A Perfect Circle, Muse, and Nine Inch Nails. With 4 EP's and 1 DVD in their catalog, they've been amazing audiences around the Puget Sound area for over 3 years.

item.title: Rain Light Fade Tackles Deep Subjects on Slaves and Sinners - NorthWest Music Scene
item.description:
Rain Light Fade Tackles Deep Subjects on Slaves and Sinners - NorthWest Music Scene

A Seattle-area rock band's new CD takes aim at a very heady topic: the trafficking of children for sexual exploitation. The songs on Rain Light Fade 's 'Slaves and Sinners' also tackle what singer and keyboardist Dane Vance Creek calls "the objectification of women and the culture that breeds it., but so often refuses to acknowledge that it's even happening."
